markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Past Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=3536) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 56</row>

</column>

---

Flashes of your life become clearer and more frequent, allowing you to apply skills you developed while alive. You become trained in a skill of your choice and gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=750) feat for a [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) subcategory tied to your life.
name: Past Life
